title: Old and New
subtle: Descriptive (nonfiction), 36 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR50L
description: Some things are old and others are new. Which do you prefer? Students can examine photographs of old and new objects in this interesting book. Old and New provides students with the opportunity to compare and contrast objects as well as to connect to prior knowledge. The book uses repetitive sentence patterns and high-frequency words to support early-emergent readers.
reviewWords: bikes, houses, new, old, pickup trucks, teddy bears
comprehension: Compare and Contrast                : Compare and contrast
grammar: Declarative Sentences                : Recognize and use declarative sentences
wordWork: High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word these
